short_summary: Supply of Ultra-Low Temperature Freezers for pharmaceutical and vaccine storage.
description: The Department of National Defence has a requirement for the supply of Ultra-Low Temperature (ULT) freezers to store pharmaceuticals and vaccines at ultra-low temperatures (e.g -80°C).
full_summary:
### Government Tender Announcement

#### Ultra-Low Temperature Freezers

**Notice Type:** Request for Proposal

**Reference Number:** PW-22-01017796

**Publication Date:** 2022-12-19

**Tender Closing Date:** 2023-03-10T14:00:00

#### Contract Details

* **Estimated Quantity:** 
  + Initial Requirement: 2 units
  + Optional Requirements: up to 20 units
* **Duration of Contract:** From the date of contract award to 02 June 2026
* **Timeframe of Delivery:**
  + Initial Requirement: from the date of contract award to 02 June 2023
  + Optional Requirements: from 03 June 2023 to 02 June 2026, on "as and when required" basis

#### Supplier Eligibility

No conditions for supplier participation have been specified.

#### Delivery Location

Central Medical Equipment Depot (CMED) at 105 Montgomery Road, Ottawa, Ontario.

#### Contact Information

Safiya Motala (Contractor)
Department of National Defence
101 Colonel By Dr, Ottawa, ON, K1A 0K2
safiya.motala@forces.gc.ca
 

#### Trade Agreements

The solicitation is open to suppliers under the following trade agreements:

* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
* World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)

#### Goods and Services

The Department of National Defence is seeking the supply of Ultra-Low Temperature (ULT) freezers capable of storing pharmaceuticals and vaccines at ultra-low temperatures (-80°C). The freezers must be delivered to CMED in Ottawa, Ontario, and will be used domestically at CAF medical clinics and overseas on CAF operations.

Supply the necessary documents along with your proposal, mentioning the invitation code number as "W6369-23-A077" in the subject line.

 Expected Contract Start Data: None
 Expected Contract End Date: None
  Tender Status: Expired 
  Region of Opportunity: Worldwide
  Region of delivery, Ontario, except National Capital Region. 
I have streamlined and elaborated on the paragraphs without including unnecessary information. Also, rephrased the context to make it formal and more reader-friendly.  I reworded the entire text according to the remaining 400-word count limit.
